Tags#

Tags are complex entities in small blocks.

CrimeDramaBiographyMystery
Tony Stark
Thor Odinson
Steve Rogers

Add a container element with the tag class. And add child text element, buttons or avatars with the avatar class. 

<span class="tag">Crime</span>

<span class="tag">
  Biography
  <a href="#" class="btn btn-clear" aria-label="Close" role="button"></a>
</span>

<div class="tag">
  <img src="img/avatar-1.png" class="avatar avatar-sm">
  Yan Zhu
  <a href="#" class="btn btn-clear" aria-label="Close" role="button"></a>
</div>
